title: Path Moments
content:
The Moments on the Path expansion adds a new type of card to the path deck: path moments.

After resolving Arrival Setup at a location (step 9 of setup or step 5 of travel), draw cards equal to the number of Rangers (players) from a Moments set and shuffle them into the path deck without looking at them. Which Moments set you use depends on your location:

  • Valley: Any location on the Valley map.
  • Arcology: Any location on one of the Arcology maps from the Legacy of the Ancestors expansion.

Path moments do not enter or leave play. Instead, when a Ranger draws a path moment, they resolve the text on the card. Once that effect is resolved, the Ranger discards the path moment unless instructed otherwise by the card's effect. "You" on the card refers to just the Ranger who drew it, but many cards will affect other Rangers.

If a path moment would enter play for any reason, the active Ranger must resolve its effect as if they had just drawn it from the path deck. Path moments also do not have presence values. Any effects that check for a card's presence value will fail when applied to a path moment.
